Room.Name: Cave in the Nellan Mountain Range
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a very desolate cave apparently in the middle of nowhere.
Room.LongDescription: It's cold. Very cold here. The cave shelters you somewhat from the snowy weather outside, but the air is still very frigid. There is a small circle on the floor that appears to glow with a bright golden yellow hue. The rest of the cave is quite desolate.
